scripts.cp: mkdir -p dist && cp -r node_modules/ dist/node_modules/ && cp package.json dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.prebuild: npm run cleanbuild && npm run cp
scripts.predev: npm run build && npm run cp && npm run upgrade -- --dev
scripts.dev: (trap 'kill 0' INT; tsc -b --watch & chokidar dist/src -c 'npm run upgrade -- --dev') && wait
scripts.prefoxx: npm run build && rm -rf /tmp/staging && mkdir -p /tmp/staging && cp -r ../type-arango /tmp/staging/type-arango && cp -r dist /tmp/staging/dist
scripts.mount: npm run prefoxx && foxx install /api /tmp/staging/dist --database cenoteando
scripts.unmount: npm run prefoxx && foxx uninstall /api /tmp/staging/dist --database cenoteando
scripts.replace: npm run prefoxx && foxx replace /api /tmp/staging/dist --database cenoteando
scripts.upgrade: npm run prefoxx && foxx upgrade /api /tmp/staging/dist --database cenoteando -f
